alert.note: Alert for Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 23 at 11:05AM CDT until March 29 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. For the Yellow River...including Necedah...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Yellow River at Necedah. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening at 715 PM CDT.
